scripts.valgrind: coffee -c test/usb.coffee; valgrind --leak-check=full --show-possibly-lost=no node --expose-gc --trace-gc node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -R spec
scripts.draft-release-ia32: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=ia32 && node-pre-gyp --target_arch=ia32 package && node-pre-gyp-github publish
scripts.release-ia32: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=ia32 && node-pre-gyp --target_arch=ia32 package && node-pre-gyp-github publish --release
scripts.draft-release: node-pre-gyp rebuild && node-pre-gyp package && node-pre-gyp-github publish
scripts.release: node-pre-gyp rebuild && node-pre-gyp package && node-pre-gyp-github publish --release
